## Join Census Data

```{r, message=FALSE}
population_data <- pop_all_years
census_data <- final_census_df

joined_census_data <- full_join(df1, df2)

View(joined_census_data)

# full join doesn't work; creates duplicate rows. maybe need inner_join
df1 <- gdp_df
df2 <- inner_join(joined_census_data, df1)
View(df2)
```
